医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 大流行期间长期悲伤障碍发生率高于大流行前时期布里斯托大学和卡迪夫大学的最新研究表明，在 COVID-19 大流行期间失去亲人的人中出现长期悲伤障碍的病例可能明显高于大流行前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Prolonged-Grief-Disorder-rates-during-COVID-19-pandemic-found-to-be-higher-than-pre-pandemic-times.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Prolonged-Grief-Disorder-rates-during-COVID-19-pandemic-found-to-be-higher-than-pre-pandemic-times.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3210d5ad-3878-47d5-b560-2a11fd1ce416 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 13:58:55 -0400 Prolonged Grief Disorder rates during COVID-19 pandemic found to be higher than pre-pandemic times
研究为女性血栓风险增加提供了新见解伦敦玛丽女王大学发表在《iScience》上的新研究表明，患有特定基因突变、雌激素使用或常见疾病（特别是肥胖、高血压、高胆固醇）的女性出现血栓的风险增加和肾脏疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-offers-new-insight-into-increased-risk-of-blood-clots-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-offers-new-insight-into-increased-risk-of-blood-clots-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b6ffd4-3b01-49ac-9809-fa57bbca5c03 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 13:48:18 -0400 Study offers new insight into increased risk of blood clots in women
对加拿大医院的首次评估揭示了环境足迹和特定的碳排放热点滑铁卢大学的研究人员完成了对加拿大医院的首次评估，以揭示其总体环境足迹和具体的碳排放热点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/First-ever-assessment-of-a-Canadian-hospital-reveals-environmental-footprint-and-specific-carbon-emission-hotspots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/First-ever-assessment-of-a-Canadian-hospital-reveals-environmental-footprint-and-specific-carbon-emission-hotspots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e181668-9dc7-464d-acc6-cf39d1c58e72 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 13:41:23 -0400 First-ever assessment of a Canadian hospital reveals environmental footprint and specific carbon emission hotspots
研究表明对抗三阴性乳腺癌的双重作用机制威斯塔研究所艾伦和罗纳德卡普兰癌症中心分子和细胞肿瘤发生项目助理教授 Zachary Schug 博士在《自然癌症》杂志上发表了一篇新论文。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Research-demonstrates-a-double-acting-mechanism-for-fighting-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Research-demonstrates-a-double-acting-mechanism-for-fighting-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f3319f7-3be0-4132-9f48-2ba46757b46b Tue, 19 Sep 2023 13:31:47 -0400 Research demonstrates a double-acting mechanism for fighting triple-negative breast cancer
SPT Labtech 为 firefly® 路演敞开大门，为英国基因组学界提供支持https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/SPT-Labtech-Empowers-UK-Genomics-Community-by-Opening-its-Doors-for-the-fireflyc2ae-Roadshow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/SPT-Labtech-Empowers-UK-Genomics-Community-by-Opening-its-Doors-for-the-fireflyc2ae-Roadshow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=474bf7ba-4fd2-4b02-b964-668f18ea0308 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 12:55:00 -0400 SPT Labtech Empowers UK Genomics Community by Opening its Doors for the firefly® Roadshow
同时使用大麻和烟草会增加抑郁和焦虑的发生率加州大学旧金山分校研究人员的一项新研究表明，同时使用大麻和烟草的人比单独使用或根本不使用大麻和烟草的人患抑郁症和焦虑症的几率要高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Using-both-cannabis-and-tobacco-linked-to-higher-rates-of-depression-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Using-both-cannabis-and-tobacco-linked-to-higher-rates-of-depression-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=322fb9ee-af41-4504-9528-8abbc7472f0f Tue, 19 Sep 2023 12:52:49 -0400 Using both cannabis and tobacco linked to higher rates of depression and anxiety
研究表明电子烟会增加青少年患哮喘的风险德克萨斯农工大学公共卫生学院的一项新研究表明，电子烟会增加从未吸过传统烟草产品的青少年患哮喘的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Vaping-increases-the-risk-of-asthma-in-adolescents-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Vaping-increases-the-risk-of-asthma-in-adolescents-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1829ade-2375-4c5a-a4aa-fa721d0b5edd Tue, 19 Sep 2023 12:28:52 -0400 Vaping increases the risk of asthma in adolescents, study suggests
研究发现肾病患者流感疫苗接种率较低的危险因素在参加慢性肾功能不全队列 (CRIC) 的慢性肾病 (CKD) 成年人中，年龄较小、黑人种族以及教育水平和收入较低与每年注射流感疫苗的可能性较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-finds-risk-factors-linked-to-lower-flu-vaccine-uptake-in-people-with-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-finds-risk-factors-linked-to-lower-flu-vaccine-uptake-in-people-with-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6e104c6-9fb6-408f-b031-b643821989ea Tue, 19 Sep 2023 12:14:00 -0400 Study finds risk factors linked to lower flu vaccine uptake in people with kidney disease

研究评估了天花感染提供的保护持续时间以及与 Mpox 病毒可能的交叉反应43年前，许多中国居民接种了痘苗病毒天坛株（VTT）疫苗，以保护他们免受天花感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-asseses-duration-of-protection-offered-by-smallpox-infection-and-possible-cross-reaction-with-Mpox-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-asseses-duration-of-protection-offered-by-smallpox-infection-and-possible-cross-reaction-with-Mpox-virus.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38a0226d-33da-4737-88ce-0beb53974bd6 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 11:19:00 -0400 Study assesses duration of protection offered by smallpox infection and possible cross-reaction with Mpox virus
